attributes.action: Make Nicky Morgan and David Cameron sit this years SATS test!
attributes.background:
If SATS are suitable for children of 10 then they should be easy for our Prime Minister and our Education Minister. 
I would like our politicians to sit the tests and to publish their scores and then we will know that they truly do know what they are talking about.

rejection.details: This is not the responsibility of the Government or the House of Commons as a whole. You could start a new petition asking the Government to change its education policies.
